title: Can Gold Reach $3,000? Citi’s North America Head of Commodities Research Weighs In
description: CNBC reports that Citi Research predicts three potential catalysts for a surge in gold prices, potentially reaching $3,000 an ounce within 12-18 months. Aakash Doshi, Citi’s Head of North American commodities research, identifies these catalysts as a rapid increase in central bank gold purchases, stagflation, or a severe global recession. title: Solana Integrates Filecoin to Enhance Historic Data Accessibility
description: Solana, one of the top proof-of-stake blockchains, has integrated Filecoin, a decentralized file-saving blockchain-based system, to make its block history accessible for third-party apps. According to Filecoin, this will allow Solana to achieve improved redundancy and scalability for part of its data set while leveraging a decentralized solution like Filecoin. Solana to Integrate Filecoin to […]

description: In today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape, the integration of advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI) and automation into the workplace is no longer a distant future but a present reality. title: Nassim Nicholas Taleb Critiques ChatGPT’s Reliability for Expert Tasks
description: In a recent commentary on X, formerly known as Twitter, Nassim Nicholas Taleb, the acclaimed author of “Black Swan,” shared his critical perspective on OpenAI’s ChatGPT. Taleb argued that the chatbot’s effectiveness is contingent upon the user’s depth of knowledge in the subject matter, highlighting that ChatGPT can produce errors only discernible by experts or […]

title: Livepeer Sees Surge 147% In Value Amidst Whale Trading Activities

title: Polygon MATIC Experiences Range-Bound Trading Amidst Selling Pressure
description: Today, Polygon MATIC token is exhibiting a range-bound behavior, encountering slight selling pressure in the early trading hours. title: Bitcoin ETF Trading Volume Surges Amidst Price Rally
description: In a resurgence of activity, Bitcoin’s ETF trading volume has soared in mid-February, surpassing $1.8 billion per day across the seven most prominent ETFs: GBTC, IBIT, FBTC, ARKB, BTCO, BITB, and HODL.  This surge in trading volume coincided with Bitcoin’s breach of the $50,000 mark earlier this week, signaling a […]

title: Here’s All About the FixedFloat Hack
description:
